title: Reports Controller
description:
Implement Report Generation, Scheduling, and Delivery Controller

Create a comprehensive controller to handle report generation workflows, including on-demand generation, scheduled execution, and multi-channel delivery.

Requirements:

Report Generation:
- Accept report type, parameters, and output format (PDF, CSV, Excel, etc.)
- Validate input parameters and user permissions
- Execute report queries/data gathering efficiently
- Handle large datasets with pagination or streaming
- Generate formatted output in requested format
- Support templating for consistent report styling

Scheduling Functionality:
- Allow users to schedule reports with cron-like expressions or simple intervals
- Store scheduled job configurations persistently
- Support one-time and recurring schedules
- Enable users to view, edit, and delete scheduled reports
- Handle timezone considerations for scheduled execution
- Prevent duplicate execution if previous job still running

Delivery Mechanisms:
- Support email delivery with configurable recipients
- Allow file storage to designated locations (local, S3, etc.)
- Provide download endpoint for on-demand retrieval
- Include delivery status tracking and notifications
- Handle delivery failures with retry logic

Error Handling and Monitoring:
- Log all generation attempts with timestamps and status
- Provide clear error messages for failures
- Implement timeout protection for long-running reports
- Track and expose metrics (generation time, success rate, etc.)

Security and Validation:
- Authenticate and authorize all requests
- Validate report parameters to prevent injection attacks
- Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse
- Audit log all report generation and access
